issue.title: comic.pixiv.net
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://comic.pixiv.net/viewer/stories/205127](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcomic.pixiv.net%2Fviewer%2Fstories%2F205127) ### Comment > This is a manga site. > You can choose whether to arrange the pages vertically or horizontally by switching the read mode in the screen, but the problem occurs when you arrange the pages horizontally. > When DNS is turned off, the ads are displayed, so you have to click the "X" mark to remove them, but then the page fills the screen. When DNS is on, the ads are blocked, but the page remains small on the screen and cannot be made larger than it should be. > Is it possible to make it so that the page is displayed in a larger size when DNS is on? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gfpo0kdtuw0gwsc40kcwok4kwckw0skmiaw6ulyilw.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5pvtfurj95c84g0kkwwo8sc88kkwwgc6tugxs7dxt0.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/57o3ugyn2ogs8w0cs0og8cw8cwggcco1mz2g9h5uwt.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.10 License type: | free Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

issue.title: Cleanup duplicate rules in AnnoyancesFilter (Popups - antiadblock.txt)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

There are multiple duplicate rules in the filters.

- [x] ##div[aria-label="Ad Blocker Detected"]
- [x] ##body > div[style*="position: fixed; display: flex; align-items: center;"]
- [x] ###ab
- [x] ###ab-message
- [x] ###ad_blocker_note
- [x] ##.ad-blocked-message
- [x] ##.adb
- [x] ##.adblock
- [x] ##.adb-def
- [x] ##.adblock_floating_message
- [x] ##.adblocker
- [x] ##.ads
- [x] #$#.ads.ad.adsbox.ad-placement.carbon-ads { display: block!important; }
- [x] #$#.adsbygoogle { height: 1px!important; }
- [x] ##.information-container
- [x] ##.no-adb
- [x] ##.special-message-wrapper
- [x] #%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.getElementById", "ad blocker")
- [x] #%#//scriptlet("abort-on-property-read", "adBlockDetected")
- [x] #%#//scriptlet("prevent-setTimeout", "test.offsetHeight")
- [x] #%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "adblock", "false")
- [x] #%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "adsbygoogle.loaded", "true")
- [x] #%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "alert", "undefined")
- [x] #%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "canRunAds", "true")
- [x] #%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "google_jobrunner", "noopFunc")
- [x] #%#//scriptlet('json-prune', 'ads')
- [x] #%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'pagead2.googlesyndication.com')
- [x] #%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'www3.doubleclick.net')
- [x] #%#//scriptlet('prevent-setTimeout', '#rbm_block_active')
- [x] #%#//scriptlet('prevent-setTimeout', '.offsetHeight === 0')
- [x] #@##adframe:not(frameset)
- [x] @@||t-online.de/s/paper/public/js/ads/adex.js
- [x] ||friendlycrayon.com^
- [x] ||b.adbox.lv/bxlib/js/loader.js$script,redirect=noopjs,domain=
- [x] ||cm.g.doubleclick.net/pixel$image,redirect=1x1-transparent.gif,domain=
- [x] ||googletagmanager.com/gtm.js$domain=
- [x] ||tpc.googlesyndication.com/pagead/images/x_button_blue2.svg$image,redirect=1x1-transparent.gif,domain=



```
gaiadergi.com##body > div[id][class][style*="z-index: 9999"]
malekal.com##body > div[id][class][style*="z-index: 9999"]
od-news.com##body > div[id][class][style*="z-index: 9999"]
propolski.com##body > div[id][class][style*="z-index: 9999"]

gaiadergi.com##body > div[id][class][style*="z-index: 9999"] + div[class][style*="z-index: 9999"]
malekal.com##body > div[id][class][style*="z-index: 9999"] + div[class][style*="z-index: 9999"]
od-news.com##body > div[id][class][style*="z-index: 9999"] + div[class][style*="z-index: 9999"]
propolski.com##body > div[id][class][style*="z-index: 9999"] + div[class][style*="z-index: 9999"]
```

































### Proposed solution

Merge or remove rules if possible.

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: Cleanup duplicate rules in AnnoyancesFilter (Popups - subscriptions_specific.txt) part 1
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

### Problem description

 
 There are multiple duplicate rules in the filters.
 
- [ ] ###custom_html-2

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973
